Hermione criticizes Harry for not trying to listen to Snape. ("You don't even try to listen to him, do you?")
Ron defends himself and Harry against Hermione's criticism. ("We just haven't got your brains or your memory or your concentration — you're just cleverer than we are — is it nice to rub it in?")

Harry, Ron, and Hermione discuss what Snape will likely set for them in the first lesson of the year. ("They had got as far as agreeing that it was likely to be something extremely difficult... when someone walked around the corner toward them.")
